name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zelda Waterfall Stream: Enchanting Pixel Art Live Wallpaper for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the magical world of *Zelda* with this captivating *Waterfall Stream* pixel art live wallpaper for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This charming live wallpaper features a pixelated scene of a serene waterfall stream, surrounded by lush greenery and gentle flowing water, inspired by the iconic *Zelda* universe. The soothing animation creates a tranquil and immersive atmosphere, perfect for fans of *Zelda* or anyone who enjoys nostalgic, pixel art visuals.

Along with the peaceful animation, this extension includes a customizable search bar, popular site shortcuts for easy navigation, and a real-time date and time display. Download now and let the beauty of a Zelda-inspired waterfall stream enhance your Chrome browsing experience!
